amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.__. (a) The total amount of appropriations made available by this Act is hereby reduced by $7,583,000,000. (b) The reduction in subsection (a) shall not apply to amounts made available-- (1) under title I; (2) under title VI for "Defense Health Program"; (3) under title IX; and.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce by $7,583,000,000 the total amount of appropriations for this bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 243 (Roll no. 489).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 243 (Roll no. 489).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
